item.description:
Hello everyone,

This is an amazing lecture. If you haven't yet made it to any of the lectures in this series, I invite you to check it out, before they are all done. I have received SO MUCH POSITIVE FEEDBACK about these presentations, everything from the beautiful graphics to how impactful the instructions have been for people in the days following the lecture. If you have even the slightest interest in either of the final two topics, do make the effort to come. You won't be disappointed.

Overcoming Bad Habits and Addictions


 Addiction is one of the most common issues that people deal with every day. In this lecture, we learn about the core reasons why addictions happen, using a psychological, emotional, and spiritual approach. You will receive practical steps to overcome bad habits and addictions, as well as personal support for dealing with your own negative patterns.

 

Coming Up:


Attracting a Romantic Partner Who Shares
Your Spirituality (11/14)

The Light Lecture Series was created because no matter where we are in life, there is always more to learn. These classes are designed for those looking to gain the skills necessary to live happier, more fulfilling and productive lives.

While it is easy to find continuing education classes that can help you learn a foreign language or a new hobby, there is little to no support available for those who are interested in moving beyond the realm of learning new skills and into the adventure of learning how to live life to its fullest.

group.name: Meditation & Inner Spirituality Group - New Haven

item.name: Overcoming Bad Habits and Addictions - Light Lecture Series
